items.name: func activate(voiceRecognitionText: String)
items.desc: Presents the Siri UI, if it is not currently active, and accepts a string which is then processed as if it were recognized speech.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: Provides debugging information about the element representing the root of the Siri UI.
